spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 749,925 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 288,984.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +1% Maximum Mana per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 8,301 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,421, up to 12,109.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.7 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Longsword of the Knight's Pledge

Transmogrified to:
Defender of the Ancient

name: Alliance Tabard
description: A fine tabard that provides no useful combat effects, but it will let everyone know you represent the Alliance.
